channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Livicus [Obviously Real]
channel.description:
[quote]
[color=gold]**The Livicus**[/color]
Goal: Successfully have a class suggestion enter Throne of Lies
**_Passives_**
**Perseverant:** Immune to death at night, Distract, Icy Touch, and being lynched.
**Studious:** Will be silent and absent from court during the day. Can only talk during daytime if presenting your idea.
**_Abilities_**
**Daydream:** (D) (oo) Spend 14 hours thinking about a class idea.
**Present and Rejection:** (D) (oo) If 2 Class Ideas have been made, gain 30 seconds to talk during the day. Cannot use Daydream again until Determination has been used.
**Refinement:** (N) (oo) Gain a Class Idea. Can only be used if Daydream was used that day.
**Determination:** (N) (oo) Gain determination to try again. You can use Daydream tomorrow.
[/quote]
Note: (This goal is impossible to achieve.)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Livicus [Obviously Real]
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I would like to win
